Description: Fragment of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Flattened handle at neck join to sharpish turn. Rectangular stamp. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Severl such stamps were drawn by Petrie (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47). Name Nikagis.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0780)
